name: DSI PCU
description:
PCU Inventory App is a mobile-optimized Progressive Web App built to streamline production control and inventory management. It loads quickly, works offline, and can be installed directly on any Android device without the need for Google Play.

With a clean interface and fast performance, PCU Inventory App gives users access to production data and tools from anywhere. The app provides offline fallback screens, local data caching, and a native-like experience with its standalone display mode.
